author: Jascmeen
title: MAC Cosmetics is releasing a new Extra Dimension Skinfinish Highlighter, and we‚Äôre ready to glow
text:
MAC Cosmetics is releasing a new Extra Dimension Skinfinish Highlighter, and we‚Äôre ready to glow For those of us who can‚Äôt get enough of gilded glam, MAC is releasing a whole new lituation. MAC has a new Extra Dimension Skinfinish Highlighter on the way and it looks absolutely gorge. We can‚Äôt say we‚Äôve ever met a highlighter we didn‚Äôt like. From the holy grail Glow palettes by Anastasia Beverly Hills to the elusive matte highlighters , if it‚Äôs bringing the glow to our cheekbones we‚Äôre all about it.
MAC‚Äôs new peachy-gold hue made its debut on the beauty brand‚Äôs Instagram, posted alongside a matching metallic lipstick, and a custom molten gold cream created with mixing medium and Copper Sparkle pigment.
You can find the pigment online , but the lippie and highlighter have been branded with the two words every beauty junkie loathes ‚Äî coming soon. We need specifics here, people!
Stay gold. #MACBackstage at @halpernstudio #AW17. Pictured: #NEW Extra Dimension Skinfinish Highlighter (coming soon!), #NEW Metallic Lipstick (coming soon!) and a custom pot of gold, created using Mixing Medium and Pigment in Copper Sparkle, shoppable now via the link in our bio. #MACShop #LFW 
A post shared by M¬∑A¬∑C Cosmetics (@maccosmetics) on Feb 21, 2017 at 5:16am PST 
No official deets have been released, but having known and loved other Extra Dimension Skinfinishes, we know what to expect. The highlighters are super pigmented, prismatic, and creamy. They‚Äôre also buildable in case you wanna keep it low key at work and LIT for a girl‚Äôs night out.
For an even better idea of how the Extra Dimension Skinfinishes get down, let‚Äôs take a closer look at the existing shades.

Happy New Years Dolls! 2017 is here! This was my new years eve beat aka #fotd #newyear2017 foundation: #esteelauderdoublewear in sandlewood mixed with #mufefaceandbody in cognac for some hydration because my skin is dry right now but still oily. Primed with milk of magnesium and #mufeprimer # 1. Used #mehron pro/HD foundation in color med/dark 4 under my eyes in my tzone. Then went over that with #lancomelonglastingconcealer in 310 set with #marcjacobspowder in 200 ivory bisque and #hourglassambientlightingpowder in diffused light. Set the rest with #lancomedualfinishpowder in 470. Cream contour came from the #mufeprosculptingpalette # 50 set it with #hourglassbronzers and #maybellinefitmepowder in 360 and #sheamoisturemandalydusk for blush I mixed #narsex habitat and #tartesurreal blush. Highlight I used #coverfxcustomenhancingdrops in #candlelight set with #macextradimensionskinfinish #beamingblush #lotd used #katvondbownarrow and #katvondnoble liquid lipstick lined with #macchestnut eye details will be in next post. #nofilter #ringlight #fullface #beatface #glammakeup 
A post shared by Fab Jennie (@fabjennie) on Jan 1, 2017 at 8:39am PST 
The Extra Dimension Skinfinishes are $33 each, you can find these four shades at maccosmetics.com ! In the meantime, stay tuned for deets on the launch of the new shade.
